mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notification(bno, rno, username, type) values(#{bno}, #{rno}, #{username}, #{type})
mapper.select: select nno, read_flag, noti.rno, noti.regdate, type, reply, title from (select nno, read_flag, rno, bno, regdate, type from tbl_notification where tbl_notification.username=#{username} and tbl_notification.delete_flag='0') as noti left join tbl_reply on noti.rno = tbl_reply.rno left join tbl_board on noti.bno = tbl_board.bno order by nno desc; limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select count(nno) from tbl_notification where username=#{username}
mapper.update: update tbl_notification set read_flag='1' where nno=#{nno}
update tbl_notification set delete_flag='1' where nno=#{nno}

update.foreach: update tbl_notification set delete_flag='1' where nno=#{nno};
